pages.text: This turret is the base of your genetic journey! $(br)The base turret does not have any special ability, but their skills are balanced, and it could make them really powerful weapons when correctly upgraded and breaded.$(br)Attributes: $(li)Can only be created with a $(l:growth_controller)Growth Controller$(/l) at any tier.$(li)Throws bullets deals direct damage.

pages.name: Base Turret
pages.text: This beautiful plant could kill you with a single pea! Avoiding conflict is recommended
